title: Java Brains. JSPs and Servlets
description:
Description
01.Introduction to Servlets

Details

This course provides an introduction to Java Servlet technology. You will learn how to develop Java web applications using Servlets. you will also understand the life cycle of Servlets, how they work and how to configure them.
Tutorials



1 Setting up
2 First Servlet Part 1
3 First Servlet Part 2
4 Understanding the Servlet
5 Servlet XML Configuration
6 The POST Method and Passing Parameters
7 Passing More Parameters
8 Understanding GET and POST
9 Request, Session and Context
10 Understanding init, service and ServletConfig



02.Java Server Pages

Details


This course covers writing and implementing Java Server Pages (JSPs) on a servlet container. You will understand what JSPs are, how they are related to servlets and how to write view logic using them.

Tutorials



1 Hello JSP
2 Understanding the JSP
3 JSP Page Directives
4 Scopes in JSP and the PageContext object
5 Using jspInit and InitParams
6 Understanding the MVC Pattern
7 Writing an MVC Application Part 1
8 Writing an MVC Application Part 2
9 Using Model object in the MVC Application
10 Using RequestDispatcher in the MVC Application
11 Introduction to JSTL and the useBean tag
12 Request Parameters with the setProperty tag
